title: Understanding Chemistry Concepts Through Molecular-Level Visualization: Constructivist VisChem Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental chemistry theories (elements, molecules, chemical reactions, etc.) and basic algebraic/geometric mathematics skills
context.additional_context: Emphasizes interaction with molecular-level animations using digital devices, restructuring learners' existing mental models, and applying them to new contexts

learning_goals: Learners can connect and explain macroscopic properties of matter with microscopic structures by analyzing molecular-level animations
Learners can visually predict intermolecular interactions in chemical reactions and integrate them with symbolic representations (chemical formulas, reaction equations)
Learners can infer and explain the essence of new chemical phenomena using molecular models formed through VisChem activities
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
